titleStmt.title: The Holy Bible containing the Old Testament and the New / newly translated out of the original tongues and with the former translations diligently compared and revised by His Majesties speciall command ; appointed to be read in churches.
Bible. English. Authorized. 1668.

The Holy Bible containing the Old Testament and the New / newly translated out of the original tongues and with the former translations diligently compared and revised by His Majesties speciall command ; appointed to be read in churches.
Bible. English. Authorized. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Contains illustrated engraved t.p., signed : Iohn Chantry.
New Testament has special t.p. dated 1666.
This item appears at reels 859:7 and 1496:4.
Reproduction of originals in the Bodleian Library and Huntington Library.
